reviews.review: Left me speechless... literally! Holy crap!!!!! Go see it people!!!!!!!!
Throughout the movie I was left on the edge of my seat, the perfect blend of drama, action and humour make this one of the best superhero movies of the last decade

A movie that managed to keep me entangled all the time and I hardly realized the time I was in the theater. 
Russos managed to bring  together so many stars, divide the time efficiently and make the interactions between them interesting and not fillers. 

Much respect to Russo brothers and everyone in the MCU for this 10 year project, which has really delivered.
This movie is highly recommended and personally I will try to see it again and again. 
Not to mention that it's been almost a week and I still think about this movie throughout the day. Something that has happened with very few other movies in the last years.
I've got to buy another ticket now...or three
Such an amazing movie loved it in every way possible. There are real consequens and amazing team ups
Best comicbook movie in a long time

I saw it last night and I'm ashamed to say it. The movies didn't have a bad plot-line, per say. But they extended the first battle for far too long, then when the final battle came into shot, it was disappointing. Too much buildup for an incredibly disappointing drop, then the credits took far too long for an equally disappointing after-credit film.

CONNECTING SO MANY CHARACTERS AFTER TEN YEARS OF MARVEL CINEMATIC UNIVERSE MOVIES IN ONE GIGANTIC EVENT IS NO SMALL FEAT. THE RUSSO BROTHERS NAIL IT, THOUGH. THEY DO JUSTICE TO MOST (MAYBE NOT ALL) CHARACTERS AND GIVE EACH THEIR MOMENT TO SHINE. MORE IMPORTANTLY, BY NOW WE ACTUALLY DEEPLY CARE ABOUT THIS BUNCH, AND WHAT HAPPENS HERE RIGHT FROM MINUTE ONE IS AS MASSIVE, ENGAGING, FUNNY AND DEVASTATING AS HOPED.. THE WAITING FOR AVENGERS 4 WILL BE A REAL BITCH. THAT'S HOW PEOPLE MUST HAVE FELT AFTER THE EMPIRE STRIKES BACK.
Best film yet, Laughter, tears, laughter, tears... then more laughter and more tears! Not one Marvel film better yet, Roll on Avengers 4
Constant action. A reward for fans who have followed all the movies and characters
